summary: Completed comprehensive testing of YouTube video preview popup improvements in PROMETHEUS SaaS video editing platform. All requested features successfully implemented including compact modal sizing, thumbnail preview cards, AI Analysis panel with processing states, and animated progress bar.
passed_tests: Video preview popup has better sizing (max-w-5xl) and fits properly on screen
Thumbnail preview card displays video thumbnail from YouTube API
HD badge is visible in thumbnail preview
Video title 'YouTube Video' is displayed correctly
'Ready to import' status is shown in thumbnail card
AI Analysis panel appears on the right side with proper layout

All 8 processing steps are visible (Detecting video format, Analyzing resolution & quality, Extracting key frames, Scene detection, Face & speaker detection, Visual style analysis, Audio transcription, B-roll opportunities)
Processing items show different states: 2 complete items with green checkmarks found
Processing animations and spinning elements are working
Progress bar shows 37% with animated gradient fill
Progress label 'Analysis Progress' is displayed
Cancel button is present and functional
Open in YT button is present and functional
Import button is present and functional
Import functionality successfully adds YouTube source chip with correct format
Modal uses compact flex layout (flex-col lg:flex-row) for better screen utilization
All animations and transitions work smoothly
YouTube provider is selected by default in Add Source modal
URL input accepts YouTube URLs correctly
Modal opens and closes properly
